anti_ai_rules: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds unless explicitly requested.
DO NOT use 'Inter' font for headings. Use 'Chivo'.
DO NOT center-align text in cards or tables. Left-align is standard for data.
DO NOT use generic 'blue' (blue-500). Use the specific 'Electric Indigo' (#4F46E5).
accessibility: Ensure text contrast ratio is at least 4.5:1.
All interactive elements must have :focus-visible styles.
Use semantic HTML (main, nav, section, article, aside).
testing: All interactive elements MUST have a 'data-testid' attribute (kebab-case).

setup: Configure 'tailwind.config.js' with the custom colors and fonts provided.
implementation_order: 1. Setup Layout (Sidebar + Header + Main Content Area).
2. Build Dashboard Overview (Metric Cards + Recent Activity).
3. Build Transactions Table (with Filters and Pagination).
4. Build Excel Import Page (Drag & Drop + Validation UI).
